page.title: 07A DAY IN MY SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: I wake up as my Dad comes in and switches my light on.He tells me to get out of bed.Five minutes later I get up and dress into my school uniform,tie,jumper,shirt and trousers.I jump on my brother and wake him up.I drag him out of bed and tell him to get dressed. Meanwhile I clean my teeth and have a wash.Quickly I go down stairs,make my sandwiches and pack my lunch-box.My Dad comes down stairs and gets the ladies breakfast(we own a rest home.) At twenty past eight I get my shoes and coat on.My Dad drives me to the bus stop to catch the L68 to school.I get off the bus and walk to school.After school which usually consists of maths and english I walk home. When I get home I have my tea and then watch T.V.till 9'O clock then I read till 10'O clock.
